The Interior Department recommended 17 projects for Congress to fund under the WIIN Act. The Energy and Water Appropriations bill being marked up today funds 16 of those 17 projects. Shasta Dam was the only one left out. My amendment would have inserted it in the bill.

I just offered an amendment to fund the Shasta Dam and Reservoir Enlargement Project, and create critical new water storage in CA. April’s jobs report is full of great news for college grads https://www.cnbc.com/2019/05/03/aprils-jobs-report-is-full-of-great-news-for-college-grads.html?__source=twitter%7Cmain …
If you’re under 50 years-old, you’ve never lived in an economy with a lower unemployment rate than we have right now.

Historically good jobs numbers:

✅ 3.1% unemployment for women, the lowest level since 1953.

✅ 4.2% unemployment for Hispanic Americans, the lowest rate on record.

✅ 2.3% unemployment for veterans, the lowest rate on record.

In addition to job growth, the economy is putting more money in family budgets. April marked the 9th straight month that year-over-year wage gains were at or above 3 percent. The most recent inflation data shows that real wages are growing, boosting workers’ bottom-line.
The unemployment rate is the lowest it’s been since 1969. pic.twitter.com/ARQ5OHaK9Q
